venue.name: Boys and Girls Club of South Boston

item.description:
The South Boston Boys & Girls Club,founded in 1938, has been serving the community in our current location on the corner of F and West 6th Streets since 1940.Their proven youth development approach helps kids experience academic success, healthy lifestyles and good character.They serve over 900 youth ages 6-18 annually, with over 220 attending daily. Most of their members come from disadvantaged and even harsh circumstances. Growing up in these dangerous conditions leave many kids at-risk to engage in unhealthy actions and destructive futures.

 

We'll be volunteering at the Boys and Girls Club Annual 5k St. Patrick's Day race.  The club will be helping out at the finish line, passing out water, etc.    Participants will receive a long sleeved T-Shirt. .. Please tell me what size you want when RSVP'ing.

Thanks.

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Volunteer at the Boys and Girls Club St. Patrick's Day 5k
